properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 10:31AM CST until January 19 at 9:36AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* until Sunday January 19.
* At 09 AM Thursday the stage was 16.2 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 17.8 feet on Thursday January 16.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Saturday January 11 and will
continue rising to near 17.8 feet by Thursday January 16. The river
will fall below flood stage Sunday January 19.
* At 18.0 feet...Water is flowing over Hood Road. The flood plain
between Town Creek and the Tombigbee River is flooded.  Extensive
agricultural flooding is occurring along Highway 6 near Bigbee.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued tomorrow or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
